name: UpdateSolutionCategory
description:
Update a solution category in Freshservice by ID.

Use this tool to update a specific solution category in Freshservice by providing the category ID.

parameters.name: solution_category_id
parameters.description: The ID of the solution category to be updated in Freshservice.

value_schema.description: ID of the solution category which has to be updated

parameters.name: category_unique_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the solution category to update. It must be an integer.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the solution category

parameters.name: solution_category_name
parameters.description: The new name for the solution category to be updated.

parameters.name: solution_category_description
parameters.description: Provide a description for the solution category being updated. This should be a brief textual summary.

parameters.name: solution_category_position
parameters.description: The position of the solution category in the category listing. Determines the order when there are multiple categories.

value_schema.description: The position of the solution category in the category listing. When there are more than 1 categories, then this will determine the position.

parameters.name: is_default_category
parameters.description: Indicates if the solution category is a default one, which restricts modifications like adding folders, deletion, or renaming.

value_schema.description: If this is a default category shipped with the product. You cannot add folders to the default category. You cannot delete or rename this category
